document_data.caption: A map showing the Wizard's Reach east of the Corsair Domains
document_data.name: Wizard's Reach
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wizard's Reach''' was a small island found in the [[Great Sea]] in [[northwest Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Geography: The island was located off the coast of mainland [[Zakhara]], approximately {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} due north of [[Qadib]] and {{SI|100|mi|k|long=yes}} due east of the [[Island of Gardens]] in the [[Corsair Domains]]. The island itself measured roughly {{SI|75|mi|k|long=yes}} in length and {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} wide.
document_data.Description: The southern half of the island was dominated by sandy dunes, while the north half was lightly forested. A [[wizard]]'s tower was found toward the center of the north half of the island at the end of a long and narrow natural bay.
document_data.Activities: The official ownership of the island was disputed between the [[Corsair Council|corsairs]] of the Corsair Domains and the [[Free Cities of Zakhara]].
